content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (x=17.5, y=20.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam Engine at position (x=17.5, y=20.5)
- Boiler at position (x=1.5, y=23.0)
- Offshore Pump at position (x=-9.5, y=24.5)
- Pipe Group (steam) connecting various positions from (x=3.5, y=17.5) to (x=10.5, y=21.5)
- Pipe Group (water) connecting various positions from (x=-9.5, y=23.5) to (x=-0.5, y=23.5)
- Electricity Group with poles at various positions including (x=3.5, y=20.5), (x=14.5, y=20.5), and others

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that the pipes are correctly aligned and connected between the boiler and steam engine. Check the positions and directions of the pipes to avoid connection failures.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
